reviewText: Probably the best Hamlet and best King Lear ever filmed.  Amazing that the Russians did it better than the Brits.  Also don't fail to check out Nikolai Cherkasov's Don Quixote (1957).
For true Shakespeare afficiando, this collection should not be missed!  Amazing visual style and compelling performances.  Convenient packaging of both films.
I really enjoyed these Shakespeare offerings visually. But, I had a difficult time reading the subtitles. They were too small and one has no time to read them. I should have known better.
